Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Energon Axe

  1. If you are playing an uninjured Captain Ironhide and you want to trigger his Bot mode ability, can you swap on an Energon Axe?
    No. Energon Axe can only be put on damaged characters.
  2. You previously ruled that Captain Ironhide can't use his Bot Mode ability to swap his weapon for an Energon Axe if he is undamaged. Does this also extend to other Upgrade movement effects? Does this mean I can't use Quartermaster or Private Red Heat to move an Energon Axe in play from a damaged character to an undamaged one?
    That is correct. Energon Axe can only be put on damaged characters.
